com.grp.application.monitor

Class ViewSetter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.grp.application.monitor.ViewSetter

  • public class ViewSetter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class ViewSetter is the class to set UI elements based on states of monitor.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    UNNC GRP G19

      Set device connection button view to enabled/disabled based on the connection of the device.

        public void setDeviceView(android.widget.ImageView symbol,
                          android.widget.Button button,

        Set device connection button view to enabled/disabled based on the connection of the device.
        Parameters:
        symbol - target symbol to show the connection state
        button - target button
        isConnected - boolean parameter whether the device is connected
